org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning
Class BaseComputeDriver

java.lang.Object
  org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.BaseComputeDriver
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseProvisioningDriver, ComputeDriverProvisioningAdapter
public abstract class BaseComputeDriver
extends Object

Base class for all compute driver implementations. A compute driver is a class that is responsible for allocating compute resources for Cloudify service instances. Includes some default implementations. This is the core

Since:
2.7.0
Author:
barakme

Constructor Detail

BaseComputeDriver

public BaseComputeDriver()
Method Detail

setConfig

public void setConfig(ComputeDriverConfiguration configuration)
               throws CloudProvisioningException
Called once on startup of the cloud driver, passing the cloud configuration to it.

Parameters:
configuration - the driver configuration.
Throws:
CloudProvisioningException - Indicates invalid cloud configuration

getComputeContext

public Object getComputeContext()
A compute driver may choose to give access to the internal 'context' which is used to communicate with the cloud API. This is an optional interface, and defaults to returning null.

Returns:
Compute context object or null if not set.

startMachine

public org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.MachineDetails startMachine(ProvisioningContext context,
                                                                              long duration,
                                                                              TimeUnit unit)
                                                                       throws TimeoutException,
                                                                              CloudProvisioningException
Starts an additional machine on the cloud , on the specific location, to scale out this specific service. In case of an error while provisioning the machine, any allocated resources should be freed before throwing a CloudProvisioningException or TimeoutException to the caller.

Parameters:
duration - Time duration to wait for the instance.
unit - Time unit to wait for the instance.
context - the provisioning context for this machine.
Returns:
The details of the started instance.
Throws:
TimeoutException - In case the instance was not started in the allotted time.
CloudProvisioningException - If a problem was encountered while starting the machine.

startManagementMachines

public org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.MachineDetails[] startManagementMachines(ManagementProvisioningContext context,
                                                                                           long duration,
                                                                                           TimeUnit unit)
                                                                                    throws TimeoutException,
                                                                                           CloudProvisioningException
Start the management machines for this cluster. This method is called once by the cloud administrator when bootstrapping a new cluster.

Parameters:
duration - timeout duration.
unit - timeout unit.
context - the provisioning context for this request.
Returns:
The created machine details.
Throws:
TimeoutException - If creating the new machines exceeded the given timeout.
CloudProvisioningException - If the machines needed for management could not be provisioned.

stopMachine

public boolean stopMachine(String machineIp,
                           long duration,
                           TimeUnit unit)
                    throws InterruptedException,
                           TimeoutException,
                           CloudProvisioningException
Stops a specific machine for scaling in or shutting down a specific service.

Parameters:
machineIp - host-name/IP of the machine to shut down.
duration - time to wait for the shutdown operation.
unit - time unit for the shutdown operations
Returns:
true if the operation succeeded, false otherwise.
Throws:
InterruptedException - If the operation was interrupted.
TimeoutException - If the operation exceeded the given timeout.
CloudProvisioningException - If the operation encountered an error.

stopManagementMachines

public void stopManagementMachines()
                            throws TimeoutException,
                                   CloudProvisioningException
Stops the management machines.

Throws:
TimeoutException - in case the stop operation exceeded the given timeout.
CloudProvisioningException - If the stop operation failed.

getCloudName

public String getCloudName()
Returns the name of this cloud.

Returns:
the name of the cloud.

close

public void close()
Called when this bean is no longer needed. Close any internal bean resources.

See Also:
- for cleaning up cloud resources.

addListener

public void addListener(ProvisioningDriverListener listener)
Adds a new listener. It is the responsibility of the cloud driver developer to publish a list of supported events.

Parameters:
listener - A class that implements ProvisioningDriverListner.

onServiceUninstalled

public void onServiceUninstalled(long duration,
                                 TimeUnit unit)
                          throws InterruptedException,
                                 TimeoutException,
                                 CloudProvisioningException
Called after service has uninstalled. Used to implement cloud resource cleanup for this service.

Parameters:
duration - time to wait for the shutdown operation.
unit - time unit for the shutdown operations
Throws:
InterruptedException - If the operation was interrupted.
TimeoutException - If the operation exceeded the given timeout.
CloudProvisioningException - If the operation encountered an error.

setProvisioningDriverClassContext

public void setProvisioningDriverClassContext(ProvisioningDriverClassContext context)
Setter for the provisioning context.

Parameters:
context - the provisioning context.

setCustomDataFile

public void setCustomDataFile(File customDataFile)
Sets the custom data file for the cloud driver instance of a specific service.

Parameters:
customDataFile - the custom data file (may be a folder).

getExistingManagementServers

public org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.MachineDetails[] getExistingManagementServers()
                                                                                         throws CloudProvisioningException
Return existing management servers.

Returns:
the existing management servers, or a 0-length array if non exist.
Throws:
CloudProvisioningException - if failed to load servers list from cloud.

getExistingManagementServers

public org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.MachineDetails[] getExistingManagementServers(ControllerDetails[] controllers)
                                                                                         throws CloudProvisioningException,
                                                                                                UnsupportedOperationException
Return existing management servers based on controller information saved previously.

Parameters:
controllers - the controller information used to locate the machine details.
Returns:
the existing management servers, or a 0-length array if non exist.
Throws:
CloudProvisioningException - if failed to load servers list from cloud.
UnsupportedOperationException - if the cloud driver does not support this operation.

validateCloudConfiguration

public void validateCloudConfiguration(ValidationContext validationContext)
                                throws CloudProvisioningException
Cloud-specific validations called after setConfig and before machines are allocated.

Parameters:
validationContext - The object through which writing of validation messages is done
Throws:
CloudProvisioningException - Indicates invalid configuration
